participant_1.background:

i love watching tv and movies.
i m looking for krav maga classes near my home.
i am a karate black belt.

participant_2.background:
I remember my mother reading to me every night before bed.
I remember buying my first house with my husband.
i love to crochet.
i recently moved to sweden.
my favorite music artist is isaiah rashad.

content.text: Hi there! Hows your day going?
Great! I just moved to Sweden and I'm really enjoying it! How about you?
Oh thats awesome! How do you like it so far? I'm doing pretty good, just got back from a concert last night.
That sounds fun! I love concerts. What band did you see?
It was an old school punk band called The Replacements. They were really good.
I've never heard of them, but I'll have to check them out! I love punk rock.
They're not really well known, but they're really good. So what do you like to do for fun?
I love to crochet, read, and listen to music. I also just bought a house with my husband, so we've been spending a lot of time working on that.
Oh that's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to crochet. What's your favorite thing to make?
I love to make blankets and scarves. I also make a lot of hats for my friends and family.
Oh that's really cool! I'm sure your friends and family love them.
Thanks! They do. So what are you looking for in a krav maga class?
I'm looking for a class that's challenging and will help me learn self-defense. I'm also looking for a class that's affordable.
Oh okay. I know of a few classes that might be a good fit for you. I can send you some information if you'd like.
